item.title: Setting Up This Website
item.description: Step 1. Install Hugo, Go, Dart Sass Go to Hugo Installation and download the appropriate version for your OS and architecture. I used the Winget Packet Manager to install the Hugo Extended Edition. winget install Hugo.Hugo.Extended Step 2. Set Up Github Pages with Hugo Follow this guide to set up Github Pages for use with Hugo. A Github Action is also set up to deploy the website automatically with new pushes.
